评论详情: This is not a Chinese piece of junk.  It's high quality, comes with a personalized card from the makers, in a nice gift box.  Happy to support the family, and it looks great too.

评论概述: NVR GVN Men's Vintage Leather Bracelets
评论详情: When it comes to accessorizing with style and rugged masculinity, look no further than the NVR GVN Men's Vintage Leather Bracelets collection. These wristbands exude a minimalist charm that is both timeless and contemporary, making them the perfect addition to any man's wardrobe.  Crafted from high-quality leather, these bracelets offer a rugged yet refined appeal that will only improve with age. The extension clasp ensures a comfortable fit for wrists of all sizes, making these wristbands versatile and easy to wear. With their minimalist design and classic aesthetic, these bracelets are the perfect accessory for any occasion.  I love the masculine minimalist style of these leather bracelets. They add a touch of rugged charm to my outfits and never fail to garner compliments. The extension clasp is a game-changer, as it allows for a customized fit that is comfortable to wear all day long. The vintage feel of the leather adds a sense of history and character to the bracelets, making them truly special.  Overall, the NVR GVN Men's Vintage Leather Bracelets are a must-have accessory for any man looking to elevate his style with a touch of rugged sophistication. From the high-quality leather construction to the versatile design and comfortable fit, these bracelets tick all the boxes. Whether you're treating yourself or looking for the perfect gift for a special occasion, these wristbands are sure to make a lasting impression.
Great looking bracelet and an easy wear. Nice packaging would make a great gift!

评论概述: Nice quality braided leather minimalist-style jewelry
评论详情: This is a nicely made braided leather bracelet with one adjustment to make it smaller. I wouldn't characterize it as "rugged" but it does have a certain appeal as a piece of jewelry.

The bracelet will even fit a man's wrist with the extender.  Granted, I'm not the hugest of men.  So, please check measurements prior to purchase.  That said, this is exactly what my daughter was hoping for.  The locking mechanism is simple and secure, and the extender locks in with only one orientation, so it should remain comfortable.

评论概述: Looks really nice, just too big
评论详情: I really like the look and feel of this bracelet but it didn't fit unfortunately. It also was a little rigid and would've preferred if it had a little more conformity. It does look really sleek and I enjoy its overall design.
I got this for my husband. The last one got him fell off.  I made sure the next had a better clasp. He likes this one a lot.
It is a nice bracelet, stylish, wears good. But it is a little thin. It would be great if it can be thicker.

评论概述: Fits large wrists, and great look!
评论详情: It's rare for me to find bracelets that fit my huge wrists (I'm 6'4" and big), so I was shocked when--with the help of the included extender--this great looking little leather bracelet fit me perfectly!  The feel and look of it are great, and it'll fit big ol' wrists like mine. I absolutely recommend this bracelet!

Comfortable, versatile, stylish. I love this bracelet and it's become my everyday go-to item. The leather works for both casual and more formal events, and it came with an extra length adjuster so if you have thicker wrists, you can still wear this. It's easy to put on and take off, but it also feels secure which is important. I don't feel like this is going to fly off my wrist at any point. I highly recommend this if it's your style.

I got the NVR GVN Brown Leather Bracelet for my boyfriend, and he absolutely adores it. The bracelet combines authentic leather with braided steel, giving it a rugged yet sophisticated look that suits any style.  The handcrafted vintage silver clasp adds a unique touch, and the adjustable fit is very convenient. It comes in two sizes, making it easy to get the perfect fit without hassle.  The quality of the materials and craftsmanship is evident, and it feels durable and well-made. My boyfriend loves wearing it daily, and it has quickly become one of his favorite accessories.

This is a decent leather bracelet. I wear a lot of different style bracelet and thought that this would be great to add to my collection. However, I found it too minimalist for my taste. It was also too large for my wrist.  However, if you have large wrists and looking for a simple looking braided leather band with a clasp then this would be ideal.

评论概述: Another nice piece of jewelry from NVR GVN
评论详情: I have five or six pieces of jewelry from NVR GVN now and I have loved every one of them including this one. The leather they use is top quality and has taken a beating from me wearing it daily over the last few months with zero issues. The fit is good for most adult males and even includes an extension if you need it. The clasp is a bit of a hassle to get undone, but it holds when you're wearing it, and you will never have to worry about it coming off. It is a nice neutral piece that goes well with casual wear, and I completely recommend it!

I received this item as a part of my membership with Amazon Vine. I am not one for wearing a lot of jewelry, other than an analog watch, but i do like to dress up a little if going out, and its the little things that make the difference when it comes to being fashionable (or so im told, lol). I already have a black bracelet to wear out but i wanted another color that would be equally as fashionable to wear and i saw this item. It has a nice, stiff leathery feel that i know will relax with time and use, and the weathered metal connectors are perfect. It comes with an extension piece for the bracelet, sicne it isnt sizeable otherwise, but i found the bracelet to be large enough to fir without it. It looks great when worn and is good quality, def recommended!

评论概述: Thoroughly impressed by the quality and design!
评论详情: I ordered NVR GVN's Leather Bracelet for Men, featuring an Authentic Matte Black Clasp with Black Leather Cuff, as a gift for a family member and was thoroughly impressed by the quality and design of this piece.  The bracelet is made from high-quality materials, which is evident in its feel and durability.  The craftsmanship is top-notch, with careful attention to detail that gives it a trendy, sleek look.  I particularly appreciated the bracelet's adjustable size design to ensure a perfect fit for the recipient.  This thoughtful feature adds to the overall value and versatility of the bracelet, making it a suitable accessory for various wrist sizes.  This leather bracelet would make an excellent gift for anyone who appreciates stylish men's jewelry with a touch of grit.  Its elegance and quality surpass many options on the market, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to others looking for a meaningful, fashionable gift.

The Leather Bracelet for Men combines black leather with steel braiding for a sleek and masculine look. With its adjustable design offering two sizes in one, this bracelet is not only a stylish accessory but also a thoughtful gift for men who appreciate grit and style in their jewelry.
this is a solid bracelet. it's made of quality material (besides the closure- it's plastic) while it is adjustable, it's still on the large side of bracelets.

评论概述: Nice bracelet but way too big!
评论详情: I got this bracelet because it looked really nice and I wear bracelets on the daily. It came in a nice jewelry gift box that can easily be wrapped up for gift giving or perfect as a stocking stuffer.  The bracelet is nicely made, it has strong metal clasps that snap on tightly so you won’t fear it coming apart and falling off your wrist.  While the bracelet is a beautiful piece, the sizing is way off for a normal man. At first, the bracelet was ridiculously big and could almost fit around my elbow area. I then realized I could remove part if the clasp area to make it shorter, but that also didn’t help (the picture I uploaded is after removing the extra clasp).  Another drawback is that the bracelet is very stiff, so it hangs rigid which I don’t care for.  All things considered, this is a nice bracelet with a couple drawbacks. I wouldn’t recommend.

I have a very thick wrist. So I am always looking for things that fit. And yes it fit with the extension. But the bracelet seemed odd with the extension on it. It was so much nicer without it on, but it was too tight not to wear without it.  I might gift it to someone with thinner wrist. But still a nice bracelet.
It is a good bracelet. Not my style but good quality.
This is a nice bracelet! It is nicely made and very durable. It is nice for my fiancé.
Very sturdy, seems to be of great quality...  The adjustability of sizing is perfect...  Would recommend...

This is a masculine bracelet that mixes fiber and metal for a cool look. The versatile locking mechanism lets you adjust the circumference. I am 5’11 and 190 lbs and the small setting fits me comfortably. As others have mentioned, there is a learning curve to fastening it but it is solidly built and looks expensive.

This renegade rustic brown cuff is the perfect blend of rugged charm and timeless style. The adjustable design, with two sizes in one, ensures a comfortable fit for any wrist. Crafted with high-quality leather, it exudes durability and character. Whether worn alone or stacked with other accessories, this bracelet adds a touch of grit to any outfit.  I've had a hard time getting the bracelet off my wrist by myself. The closer tends to stick and be hard to take off alone.

评论概述: Critical review — Not easy to put on, and can come off easy with a large wrist
评论详情: I'm a big guy with a good sized wrist, which measures 8.5 inches. As a result, the bracelet is NOT easy to put on. If your wrist is large, expect to have issues on putting it on.  The next day after receiving the bracelet, when I arrived home from an appointment, I noticed the bracelet was no longer on my wrist. I was immediately disappointed, and was going to write how the clasp wasn’t reliable. When I was heading out later, it had come off in my coat.  It’s a beautiful bracelet that is a nice dark brown in color. The metal clasp is understated, which adds to the attraction of the bracelet.  4 Stars = Excellent product. A solid buy, but careful about it coming off when you least expect it. And if you have a larger wrist, it will not be easy to put on your wrist.

I wear a lot of grey, and I was stoked to see that color offered in this bracelet. The braided leather seems to be of excellent quality, and a link can be removed from the cunning clasp to reduce the size somewhat. And by the way, that clasp is so robust I had to use needle-nosed pliers several times to limber it sufficiently to unfasten it without the aid of hand tools. I like to layer bracelets, and this one is ideal for that purpose. Woven leather bracelets have been popular for a while now, and they are available at stratospheric cost from all the major designers; however, this one answers fashion's call at a very modest price, so there's no reason to spend more unless you're a label snob. And we don't know anybody like that, do we?

评论概述: Nice leather bracelet with a tight (& expandable) clasp
评论详情: I like bracelets, and being able to easily take them off. This dark brown woven leather bracelet fits the bill. The dark grey metal (steel) claps appears to be pretty solid and won't come open. It does come with an extender piece in case you need more room (I didn't, and took it off and the bracelet fits perfectly.) No smell to the leather and comfortable fit. The clasp does take some getting use to on how to open, but that honestly makes me think it won't open accidentally.  Comes in a nice box with a drawer. The bracelet itself is not in any plastic, but does have a gel pack to soak up any moisture during shipping (a good idea, since it's leather). Really happy with it and plan to wear it with other bracelets.

I wish this item was adjustable but nonetheless it is a great bracelet. It’s not heavy and not itchy for the kind of material it is. It doesn’t deteriorate after multiple washes. Good item but adjustability would be what makes this a catch.

评论概述: Excellent Quality, Adjustable Size, East To Get On And Off
评论详情: This is the 8.5" Version of the NVN Leather Men's Bracelet and it's simple, elegant and comfortable to wear.  It's a quality-made tight leather braid with just enough play to be flexible, and not rigid the way 'affordable' less expensive bracelets often are. This one is listed as their 8.5"model, but one of the clasp connectors can be removed, making it very comfortable on my 7.5" wrist.  Please see the pics for a walkthrough and explanation of the sizing.  The leather looks and feels good, and the clasps look like pewter and have good weight to them, suggesting they are not the usual lightweight hardware often used on bracelets at this price point.  It is very easy to put on, and there is a press-down 'trigger' that releases the locking mechanism to remove. One caveat: sometimes it requires a little more pressure and stronger pull to unclasp - nothing major, but worth noting.  Also, it is a nice rich brown leather - the pics don't do it justice.  Overall, is is elegant and can be worn with another bracelet without there being too much weight or busyness; definitely suitable for work and sturdy enough to hold up to some 'abuse' (gardening, other manual activities) without tearing or scratching, at least to date.  In short: if you're looking for a subtle addition to a bracelet collection that looks and feels high quality, and is adjustable, it's a definite buy!

评论概述: Looks great and easy to put on
评论详情: This looks great and the leather is smooth against my arm. There is an extra clasp included that can be removed to make the bracelet smaller. I was able to hook it together with one hand, as one has to do with bracelets. But it's also large enough to slip over my hand without unclasping. Looks rustic yet refined. Goes well with my dark metal jewelry.

评论概述: Brilliant accessory that's both subtle and unique
评论详情: Pros: - This is a great design, I love the distressed gray color and it's wound very tightly around so it looks like one solid piece. It stands out, but isn't overtly distracting. - The clasps looks very nice and is very solid. I do not have any concerns about it accidentally unclasping at all. - Includes and extra link for larger diameter wrists.  Cons: - Not really a con, but the clasp is very strong so it takes some effort to get it down.  Overall: The design speaks for itself, but this really is a great accessory. I take it off before showering and try not to get it wet, but so far it's help up well haven't had any issues so far. If you'd like a subtle bracelet that doesn't stand out too much, this is a great everyday piece that I would highly recommend.
Well made leather rope tightly bound to metal reminiscent of the original binding method and holds its shape well. The bracelet Is an easy buy to upgrade in style 5 Stars!

This is actually a very nice little bracelet.  It comes with an extra piece in the middle of the clasp that can be removed to shorten the length, which for me is perfect on the "size up" size selection here.  I have pretty big wrists as is, so to know that it can fit somebody with an even bigger wrist than mine is pretty nice IMHO.  The clasp feels solid and the whole bracelet has a nice, quality feel to it.  It's nothing fancy, but the combination of metal and leather is stylish in a somewhat understated way.  If you don't like having bare wrists but you also don't like wearing attention grabbing jewelry, this should fit the bill nicely.
This bracelet is made out of high quality leather, and it looks really good.
Beautiful leather braided bracelet for men. Comes with an extension piece for larger wrists like mine. Fits great. Comes in nice gift box.

My wife told me to get this for myself, so I tried it out.  I wear it constantly, shower, working, whatever. It still looks great, it is lightweight, so I don't feel it on my wrist, and it goes well with my other bracelet.

This bracelet feels like it was made really well, and I definitely appreciate how you’re able to take a link piece out to make it a little smaller! I wear mine on my same wrist as my watch, and I have no problems! I took some pictures with and without the watch, just to give you a better perspective!!

The bracelet is really nice quality, seems like real leather. It’s tightly woven and comes with a sizer to for larger wrist sizes which is a nice bonus, although my wrist seems to be quite small even without the spacer. Really nice bracelet and looks great!

This rustic, sturdy, rich-brown cuff is advertised for men, but it also looks good on women. The leather braiding is very attractive and outstanding quality. The metal clasp is stainless steel, so it doesn’t affect my nickel allergies. The clasp is very strong, and the metal extension can be removed to create two adjustable sizes for men and women. This also means that if the leather stretches, it will be easy to make the bracelet smaller. In a word, this leather bracelet is cool. And it complements my watch, necklace and another bracelet that are all made of wood. Love it.

This bracelet is awesome, like everything else I have from this brand! The leather is good, the weave is very clean and tight. I think there may be a stabilizing core inside, so it's nice and sturdy. The clasp is very easy to put on, but extremely secure - it's not going to accidentally release while you're wearing it.  Looks great, feels great, highly recommend!

The stylish look recently has been too wear a coordinating bracelet with a watch on the same wrist. Most of my bracelets are too chunky to look good with a be watch. This sleek smaller diameter bracelet with a woven leather and stainless steel looks terrific with my casual and dressy watches. Finally a clasp that doesn't loosen during the day! It stays secure and it's comfortable. The nice gift box included a small expansion piece for larger wrists. If you are looking for a stylish gift for a fashion forward gentleman, you can't go wrong with this piece.

I like the stuff this brand puts out.  Definitely quality material and well made.  This particular band is a little pricey but the leather actually looks like LEATHER, not cheap and plastic-y and has a premium feel and look to it.  The clasp is unique...seems to hold well, haven't had it randomly come loose on me at all.  Good for casual or dressier occasions, versatile and modern.

This is a nice bracelet. The braided leather is very tightly and consistently woven. The dark brown color is very natural and goes well with various outfits. The clasp is easy to work with. It is a faded grey and looks great. It comes with two clasp pieces for size adjustment. It looks quality and feels great on the wrist very comfortable.

This bracelet is really nice and well made. Sturdy connectors, which allows for adjusting the size. Leather is tightly braided. Great for guys who want to accessorize but still want that manly, rugged look. Comes in a nice box as well.
I got it for my son and he likes it. It is a quality bracelet, well made and doesn't irritate his wrist. I would recommend.
Good quality overall but very large. Even after taking out the adjustable bracket this a large bracelet.
This is a cool bracelet, i like how it looks and it fits great.

Ingeniously constructed. The little piece of metal that is held in place with magnets which can be used to fit the bracelet to your wrist is pretty smart, truly. The leather is finely woven or braided and held strongly and firmly in place by the metal end pieces. My sole criticism is that the black leather is just a tad too shiny for my liking. But, that may fade in time anyway, right? The bracelet comes expertly packaged in a decorative box suitable for gifting.

Out of the box, I absolutely loved the look of this bracelet!! It's a heavy braided leather band that feels like quality leather.  The clasp is extremely durable and easy to get on and off!! I love the extra piece you can use for bigger wrists like mine! You can easily take it off if you have smaller wrists. I wear this all the time, it goes on and off along with my smart watch!!

评论概述: Looks good and was a good price
评论详情: Produce looks good. Nice leather braid; not too large and not too small. Look masculine. The sizing is perfect. The clasp comes with an additional expansion piece for larger wrists. Nothing bad to say other than the clasp can be hard to hook and unhook. That may resolve itself as the clasp gets broken in.

I've gone through phases over the years with wearing a bracelet. I'm not a flashy metal type guy so I've usually preferred leather or fabric. This bracelet is very nicely made and the attention to detail has not been ignored. The removable link to expand or shorten the bracelet in itself is very nicely crafted. Very happy with the quality and finish of this product. Highly recommend.

I am not usually a bracelet guy. I took a chance on this and I am genuinely impressed. Sturdy and easy to put on. Looks good with any attire. I am an outdoor woodsy guy and it suits well as does it business casual at work.

评论概述: Attractive and easy to put on
评论详情: This looks nice on and it comfortable overall, I just found that it felt a little rough, but it's large enough that it's not going to irritate my husband's wrist. It's great that it's so easy to get on and off, he reaches for it more because he doesn't have to fight to put it on. It looks really nice and I loved that it wasn't a standard brown or black.

评论概述: Not bad, but not quite as expected either
评论详情: While the bracelet does look like the photos in the product listing, the finish does look a little more artificial than I expected. The leather part appears overly glossy, making it appear more like an artificial/imitation material rather than actual leather. I'm hoping a little physical wear and tear will break it in better and cause the appearance to improve over time. The clasp feels nice and strong. A little stiff at first, but not hard to use at all.

评论概述: Gave as a gift and he loved it
评论详情: I picked this up for my boyfriend who recently started wearing a few similar bracelets. This one quickly became his go-to -- it's substantial and well-made and the clasp is substantial and secure. He loves the look of this one and we were both pleasantly surprised by the quality. Looks great, well-made, great price...winner!

评论概述: Stylish, well made, a bit heavy for my taste
评论详情: This is a very nice looking bracelet. I wanted something simple and black and I really like the braided leather. It comes in a nice box which I think is gift worthy. The latching mechanism is interesting. It includes a removable section to make the bracelet shorter if necessary. I need the extender in and with it in I find the bracelet a bit too heavy for my liking. I am used to wearing a very light, thin bracelet so maybe it's just me. The latch to open the bracelet works well, but as with many latches, it is small and requires some precision. Once you get it figure out though it works well and seems very sturdy. I don't think this is going to come off by accident.

I’m really picky about these sorts of things. In general, I think most forms of’ jewelry’  on men are disgusting - particularly when said jewelry includes sparkly and shiny things that are in complete contradiction to masculinity as I culturally perceive it. Having said all this, I wear a leather-banded watch on my left wrist, and my right wrist feels pretty naked without something on it. In the past I have just tied a length of jute there, and that has been fine - except in formal situations. Jute twine on the wrist does not exactly compliment a suit and tie. This ‘bracelet’ here (I hate to even call it that since that word alone seems incompatible with what a man should have on his wrist. Let’s call it a wrist rope…) is near perfect. It is not flashy at all, it has no ridiculous gold trim or shiny silver parts. Even the clasp is painted a dull black. The wrist rope comes with an extension piece for larger wrists - something that should be included in every accessory for men like this. I have been wearing it for about a week now and I love it. It’s simple and fits in just as much in a formal setting as it does a casual one. Why do I say it is “almost” perfect? Because I would prefer it in brown. Otherwise, for discerning and picky guys like myself, it’s about as good as things like this come.

I love this bracelet! It has a tight leather weave and a strong, yet easy to open and close clasp. It looks really good and rustic and is comfortable to wear. I will get more masculine jewelry from this company.

A perfect blend of organic and mechanical craftsmanship. Uniform blackness, which gives rise to light and shadowplay across the two structures. The clasp is a simple lever and spring catch, but is sleekly high-tech in appearance. It contrasts beautifully with the braided leather. It is also quite secure, once engaged, requiring a bit of one-handed finger finesse to take the bracelet on and off, but not so much that won’t become fairly automatic with time. My hope is that the matte black finish will not erode off the metal clasp over the life of the bracelet. This accessory pairs nicely with any sartorial choice I can imagine from denim to Cashmere. I should also add that it is very comfortable to wear, and, with the addition of the extra clasp, it will accommodate a wide range of wrists circumference..

I recently got this leather bracelet as a gift for my husband, and he loves it. The bracelet's feel and appearance were immediate hits. The quality of the leather was palpable, soft enough to be comfortable on the wrist while still maintaining that tough, worn look that adds so much character. The bracelet's design and material struck a perfect balance between ruggedness and style.  He's found it remarkably easy to put on and take off, which is a huge win. I highly recommend.

This is a great accent bracelet. It looks great on it’s own or paired with other bracelets. The clasp closes nice and secure and it’s easy to put on with one hand. The material is comfortable for all day wear. It has a removable extender for larger wrists. I’m very happy with it.

This is yes, a mens bracelet, it's fine, comes with the extension on by default so if you had a small wrist you could remove it so it doesn't hang, visually it's fine though I had trouble putting it on, both with one hand or two, two I always pinch, and with one I just can barely not get it on its silly
Great bracelet for the price. Well made and comfortable. Easy to put on and take off.

评论概述: Good quality but a little big
评论详情: If you like how this looks and you have large wrists, then this is the bracelet for you. The quality is very nice on this item and it looks great too. I personally don't like wearing bracelet's that are this loose, but obviously how loose it is all depends on the size of your wrist. There is even a extension piece to allow this bracelet to get even bigger. This is a well made item that looks nice, but if your wrists are on the smaller size you might be disappointed.

Nice size.  Having the adjustable piece was a plus.  It's a touch stiff but I think it will relax with use.  It's a nice subdued pattern and color, which was what I was looking for.  I was afraid the latch method would be obtrusive but it's hardly noticeable.

评论概述: Very Nice Bracelet and interesting clasps.
评论详情: This grey leather bracelet looks awesome! The coloration and the weave make it look serpentine, and the clasp(s) are the round notched-peg design, but it includes an extra latch segment which can work alongside the other three points, making the bracelet larger, or be removed to make the bracelet about 0.5" tighter.  This is one of the nicest bracelets I've received in awhile and came in a very nice box.
awesome look
I was going to use it for me, it's too big BUT I ended up using it for my ankle, looks a lot better that way. Definitely is leather and comes in a cute box. I like it.

评论概述: Stylish, Masculine, Rugged-Looking and a Great Value
评论详情: I got this NVR GVN Black Leather and Steel Bracelet for my boyfriend and he LOVES it! And I think it is gorgeous on him! It was a little hard to put on at first, but I love the thick braided black leather and polished stainless steel clasp. The design is a balance between simplicity and sophisticated masculinity. It’s definitely good for both casual and dressier occasions. The extension clasp ensures the right fit, even with larger wrists, although it seems fairly large to begin with. The quality of leather is nice and I think will hold up well and maintain its shape. The clasp is strong and secure and he says the leather is soft against the skin and he doesn't even notice he's wearing it. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a high-quality, stylish, masculine, and sort of rugged looking leather bracelet - especially as a gift for the man in their life.  I think it its an excellent value.

Impressed at a glance! This is not a cheap plastic string. It's a substantial leather cord. It's stiff, but malleable enough to be comfortable. I really like the hasp. It's fairly easy to manipulate with one hand, and accommodates a really cool extension which enables a bigger-than-average guy like myself, to enjoy an accessory like this that I otherwise could not!

评论概述: Quality seems to be there, higher price though
评论详情: I do like the quality of this item. It is a little bit more rigid, so I’m hoping that it will become more flexible as we go on here… But that is the only issue I’m seeing so far. It looks very nice. I do not use the extender piece and it goes on and off very easy. I am happy with the functionality.

Real nice quality, note the metal clasp does poke me when working at a desk, so be aware of that.  Also, it takes some getting used to to work the lock.  Anyways, it does look get for a night on the town.  Makes a great gift.

评论概述: The clasps are hard to work at first but just need to be broken in.
评论详情: This grey leather bracelet is really attractive. The distressed look gives this a lot of character. But it's the woven leather that really adds depth. This bracelet has the durability and attractiveness that anyone would want. It also has an option to shorten or lengthen it. There is a piece that can be removed. Both the clasp and the extension piece work the exact same way. You have to push down on the highest part to release the other end. At first, it's awful and seems almost impossible. I found the only way to open it was to use the side of my finger which hurt. Or to use one of my nails, which always caused damage to my nail. I have realized that if you play with it while not wearing it. The catch loosens. I had to break both clasps in and now they are easy to use. They are also still very secure. To break this in I just watched tv while I fastened and unfastened all 3 pieces over and over again for a little while. I haven't had any issues since then.

评论概述: It's probably closer to a two
评论详情: The grey is more of a blue grey but that isn't the actual issue of the item. The connection looks fine but can be finicky but that additionally is not a total buzzkill for this item. The issue here is the "leather" is that very plasticy faux leather that has been printed on. It has a high amount of shine to it as it has no texture to it. It looks and feels cheap and the only thing that really is keeping from the 2 two rating is that it works perfectly fine.

This leather bracelet is interlaced with steel cording and looks great on!  It is not bulky at all and is very solid.  Opening the clasp is a bit tricky for me, you have to hold down both buttons to get it open.  I'm thinking with a bit of use, it will get easier.  This comes in a very nice box with felt and would make a perfect gift!

评论概述: Looks cool but not for me
评论详情: I really like it, it's sturdy and well made and has a unique sort of industrial look to it. The added extender makes it so that it would fit almost any size wrist. My problem with it is it too durable. Like if I got it caught on something I feel like my I might lose my hand. Maybe I'm paranoid but it makes me nervous to wear it, I need something that I know will break away if I need it to. But don't let that discourage you, I do recommend it if you're looking for some cool gear.

评论概述: Great quality, easy on and off, adjustable size without anything dangling
评论详情: This is a very nice woven bracelet. It closes with a snap closure and there is an extension snap closure included if you need the bracelet to be bigger. So it’s not infinitely adjustable, just two sizes, but I found that to be fine for me.  Looks great, good value.

I got this for my son.  It comes in a nice gift box that’s nice enough to keep and store the bracelet in when not in use.  I liked that it has an extra link in it that can be left in or taken out to fit your size needs.  Luckily, my son is like myself, and we can fold our hands to roughly the size of our wrists so clasping and unclasping to put it on and take it off is not an issue.  The bracelet is a bit lighter weight than I had thought it would be which is a good thing.  I was afraid that it might be heavy and clunky, but it is not.  He really liked the bracelet when I gave it to him.  He’s a guitar player and it looks great on him on stage.  Well, I’m his mom and I’m probably biased but I do like the bracelet and my son does too.  Win, win!

评论概述: A little too feminine when worn alone
评论详情: I don't have a collection of bracelets, so I tried to wear this bracelet on its own. As a standalone bracelet for men, I found it to be a little too thin - but I can see how, if you had several bracelets, it would look good when stacked.  The material itself is quite nice and the clasp is easy to open and close. There is also an additional clasp piece that you can remove if the size of the bracelet is too large.
Very nice, nice and solid sturdy. It's it's very nice for a man, but women could use. It also very giftable, very nicely crafted.

I love this bracelet ! The problem with most bracelets for me is , they're way too small and don't fit . This one fits perfectly and is a little loose the way its supposed to be . And I love the gray distressed look
Well made and stylish bracelet with a secure lock mechanism, nice looking and not gaudy!

评论概述: Very good looking and two sizes
评论详情: I have other jewelry from this brand and find it always to be good quality.  I like this gray/silver color. It gives the leather a vintage look.  The clasp is tight.  I have fairly large hands and wrists and found that the larger size was too big.  It was easy to remove the spacer and go to the smaller size.  The clasp works the same way on the spacer as on the bracelet itself.  It’s comfortable to wear.
I like the color. I like the texture. It's got a good size to it and it looks terrific on. Overall I'm really happy with it.

Bracelet is presented nicely in a classy box. The bracelet itself is beautiful It's subtle and tasteful. I read that some had challenges with the clasp - but I found it easy to clasp, even with one hand.. The clasp is nicely blended into the bracelet. The texture is very nice along the skin. This was a real winner and I'm looking forward to getting a great deal of enjoyment out of it.

评论概述: A Braided Leather and Stainless Steel Men's Bracelet
评论详情: A good looking men's bracelet - braided with leather and stainless steel. I like the simplicity of it and its best feature - the locking mechanism. There is a tiny detent you have to push/press to unlock and push-in inside (clicks in) to lock really easily.. I had a bracelet that has a magnet for locking and it always falls off when gets bumped accidentally...... and there's more - there is an extra piece and can be part of the lock if you need to wear this bracelet looser (lengthens). In my case I did not need this extra piece and it fits my wrist perfect.
I wear this all the time, in the shower and at the gym and it hasn’t tarnished

I really like this bracelet, with the black leather and stainless steel wound through it, it's very masculine and looks really good when it's being worn. The leather and the clasp have about the same level of shininess, I'd say it's somewhere between a satin and semi gloss, so the bracelet pops really well.  The clasp is nice because it has about a 1/2" extender built into it that you can remove to shorten the bracelet. I find it's super easy to close the bracelet, but I had a bit of a hard time opening it, which I suppose the way you want it to work so it doesn't fall off easily.  Overall I recommend it, it looks really great when I'm wearing it, and comes in a really nice box that would be great for gifting. Now if I can just keep from ruining it by getting it wet!!

评论概述: Cool Bracelet with a Not So Cool Clasp🧐
评论详情: This is a Black Leather Bracelet for Men.  It is Black with Steel braided within it.  It looks really nice on & appears to be made well, except for the actual clasp.  Unfortunately, it is made of a plastic material that isn’t easy to clasp, comes undone easier than putting on(by accident often) & also can pinch you if you aren’t careful.😣. If they would have put just as much care in the actual clasp as they did with the bracelet, it would of been great.🤷🏼‍♀️❤️‍🔥Shalom…

评论概述: Well Made but A Little Stiff
评论详情: So this is made well enough and the fit and finish is good and even the design is nice, but it's a little stiff it doesn't sit well on my wrist and the clasp is kind of weird and I just don't like it. But that's a personal preference not anything against the product itself. It's just a little cheap feeling. 3 Stars.

评论概述: quality leather bracelet with strong clasp
评论详情: This is an authentic leather mens bracelet enhanced by steel. It features an extension clasp. It has an elegant design and is light weight. Clasp is well made and it will not fall off. Received a lot of compliments for it. Quality purchase for the price.

This woven black leather and stainless steel wire bracelet offers something truly unique and masculine!  Its sleek design makes a powerful though subtle statement. The expansion clasp is a great convenience.  The sleek black gift box enhances its presentation, making it an excellent choice for gifting either oneself or someone else.

评论概述: Very Nice... Size is Bigger than Expected
评论详情: This is a very nice bracelet. The woven leather and wire look classy but still casual enough to wear every day. The clasp has a solid lockup that I'm not worried about opening unexpectedly. The matte finish on the clasp is also appropriate, a shiny finish would not have been a good look for this bracelet.  After watching the Seller video about how to put it on (use a flat surface to hold it in place while you squeeze the ends together) I didn't have any trouble putting it on without any help.  My only warning to other potential buyers is that the overall length is bigger than expected. I would describe my wrist size as "athletic". I wear size XL gloves and don't have much/any excess bulk at my wrists. When I remove the small extension piece, the bracelet fits me just right, maybe just a touch big.... If you have bigger wrists, this would be a good choice for you. If you have small wrists/hands, this might be too big, even with the extra link taken out.  Overall a solid 5 stars from me, but be sure the size is right for you.

I ordered this bracelet for my teen son, and it seems like a durable piece of jewelry. The leather is stiff and tightly woven, and the clasp is painted metal (the brand name is on the inner side of the clasp, so it can't be seen while the bracelet is on). It comes nicely packaged for gifting, with a second clasp to extend the size. The smaller size is still pretty loose on a 7 inch wrist, but the expanded size is perfect for a larger (10 inch) wrist like my husband's (see my pics).  Overall, this bracelet seems durable, and does fit a large wrist as claimed in the item description. My son is happy with it, and I would order it again.

This bracelet is solid quality braided leather with metal clasps. It’s slightly adjustable in that one of the clasps can be removed, however I still found it a bit large, and it lays kind of oddly on my wrist. The clasps are difficult to open with one hand, which is why I deducted one star. Hoping the clasp gets a bit looser with time. Nice presentation in a black padded box and would make a good gift.

评论概述: Looks awesome! Not easy to put on.
评论详情: This review is for the Black Leather and Steel Bracelet for Men Braided Cuff with Extension Clasp for Size Up.  After I was able to put it on, with help from my wife, I immediately love wearing this beautiful piece.. It's solid, feels elegant and premium, but unfortunately it was a little too big for me. Not enough to take off another star though. I can get used to it looking big on my wrist and is not a deal breaker. I can see a specialty store charging triple the price for it without a doubt and I don't have a problem paying the asking price here in Amazon.  I'm taking a star off because of how difficult it is to put on, but still like it enough to recommend it if you're looking to add something different to your bracelet collection or are looking for nice gift for family or friend.

评论概述: Lowkey, modern look. A little difficult to clasp.
评论详情: I like the modern style and the neutral colors make it great for mixing/matching. The clasp is a little tricky though. Both sides have a button, but only one of them seems to do anything. I'm sure I'll get used to it.

Already had several compliments on this wonderful braided bracelet - jet black with and extension clasp to fit larger wrists like mine, the leather and steal creates a very unique look and cool image-  goes well with formal evening attire and business wear while also being a great addition to more casual looks. High quality and looks great.

评论概述: Somewhat adjustable, a bit large for my wrist even after adjustment
评论详情: I have fairly average sized wrists so I was surprised when even after I adjusted the bracelet it was still too loose and kept slipping up my arm.  I like the way it looks, so I wished it would stay on the lower part of my wrist where it can be seen and admired.  The bracelet comes installed with a ¾ inch removable link for those with a particularly large wrist.  In terms of value, at the bottom of the Amazon product page in the “Products related to this item” there are multiple similar items, some with double leather wraps, which cost about 2/3 what this bracelet sells for.  Of course it’s difficult to assess the quality of these items without having the actual item to touch and look at, but they seem pretty similar from their illustrations.

This men's bracelet looks grand on my husband, it fits him nicely, and it is a beautiful design. I love it on him so much and it stretches nicely over his wrist, and he has strong big wrists that he uses to do lots of heavy duty labor. It will be a great show piece during one of our trips together, he will wear it grandly. I love it on him, it is a very high-quality design and material.
